name: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried
description: Maintain an accurate, up-to-date inventory of all physical devices and systems within the organization, including information about device type, location, owner, and criticality.
guidance: Organizations should establish and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all physical devices that connect to the organization's network or process, store, or transmit organizational data. This includes but is not limited to: servers, workstations, laptops, mobile devices, network equipment, IoT devices, and operational technology. The inventory should be regularly updated to reflect additions, changes, and removals. Automated discovery tools can help maintain accuracy.
references: CIS Controls v8: Control 1 - Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets

evidenceLocations.description: Automated asset inventory from enterprise asset management system

assessmentNotes: Asset inventory maintained but lacks full automation for IoT and OT devices. Manual processes still required for some asset types.
notes: Working towards full automation. Current coverage: Servers (100%), Workstations (100%), Network devices (95%), Mobile devices (90%), IoT/OT (60%). Need to improve IoT/OT device discovery and cataloging.
